definition: border station/strategic defensive position on frontier
suffix of a noun of locality
side/edge/margin/border/boundary/CL:個|个[ge4]/simultaneously
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
surname Guan

sentences.english: Since ancient times, many colorful banditry commotions more unprecedented.
sentences.chinese: 自古边关多匪患，骚动年代更空前。

sentences.english: Sino-American relations belong  to the  complicatedest  bilateral   relations.
sentences.chinese: 中美关系是最为复杂的一对双边关系。

sentences.english: The Chinese premier also expressed the hope that the 60th anniversary of the establishment of the Sino-Indian diplomatic ties would become a new starting point for the development of the relations.
sentences.chinese: 我希望中印建交60周年成为双边关系发展的新起点。

sentences.english: Qarase fully agreed with Wen's comments on bilateral relations.
sentences.chinese: 恩加拉塞完全赞同温家宝对双边关系的评价。

sentences.english: Both sides exchanged views on bilateral ties and issues of common interest.
sentences.chinese: 双方就双边关系及共同关心的问题交换了意见。

sentences.english: Both competition and co-operation will feature in U.S.-China bilateral ties in the 21st century.
sentences.chinese: 21世纪的美中双边关系既有竞争又有合作。

sentences.english: Tang expressed satisfaction over the recent steady development of Sino-Mexican relations.
sentences.chinese: 唐外长对近年来中墨双边关系持续发展表示满意。

sentences.english: Kilman agrees on the comment of the Chinese side on the bilateral ties.
sentences.chinese: 基尔曼赞同中方对双边关系的评价。

sentences.english: Tang Jiaxuan pointed out that relations between China and Bosnia-Herzegovina have been developing smoothly since the establishment of diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇指出，中波两国建交以来，双边关系发展平稳。

sentences.english: China and Russia should continue viewing and addressing our bilateral ties from a strategic perspective.
sentences.chinese: 中俄两国应继续从战略高度来看待和处理双边关系。

sentences.english: Contradictions and differences are inevitable in the development course of bilateral relations.
sentences.chinese: 在双边关系发展中，出现一些矛盾和分歧在所难免。

sentences.english: It's the silly season in India-China relations.
sentences.chinese: 在印度与中国双边关系上，目前是一个新闻饥渴期。

sentences.english: Li extended a welcome to Kabila for his visit and spoke highly of Sino-DRC relations.
sentences.chinese: 李鹏欢迎卡比拉来华访问，并积极评价中刚双边关系。

sentences.english: He said that since the establishment of diplomatic ties between China and Mauritius, bilateral relations have been growing smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 他说，中毛两国建交以来，双边关系发展顺利。

sentences.english: The two heads of state exchanged in-depth views on pushing forward bilateral ties.
sentences.chinese: 两国元首就推动双边关系进一步发展深入交换意见。

sentences.english: Trong said that he fully agreed with Hu's proposal on developing bilateral relations.
sentences.chinese: 阮富仲表示完全赞同胡锦涛关于发展双边关系的建议。
